body: When this canine fang is crushed or broken as a full-round action, it summons a winter wolf. The wolf is under the control of the creature that broke the fang. The wolf remains for 1 minute or until slain.
name: Winter Wolf Runetooth
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/New Rules/Frost Giant Magic Items/Winter Wolf Runetooth

Construction Requirements.descriptor: 1,250 gpCraft Wondrous Item, summon nature's ally V
